descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: We will read a range of literature from modern Middle Eastern authors: short stories, novels, memoirs, essays and works of drama?most being translated works from Arabic, Persian, Urdu, and Turkish. We will examine and explore the splendors of this region through the voices of its writers and poets, whose literature tells urgent and liberating stories. With a wealth of contextual information that places the writing within the historical, political, and cultural breadth of the region, our analysis will create a vital bridge between modern Middle Eastern and Western cultures.
